comment.author: Alyssa
comment.text: Happy Halloween!!!! You Hillary haters are ridiculous!!!!! Thanks to FBI emails we will find out "nothing" again!!! Hillary is most qualified person to be president of the united States!!!! Trump= Russia's puppet and or war!!!!!! Nukes!!!! Doom!!! #trumpswarwitheveryone

replies.author: Zebulon
replies.text: Calm your sac. Hilldawg would say you are a needy Latino. Whip us up a pitcher of mojitos, Taco Boy, and make it snappeh.
